---
title: "NA filling"
---

## Dataset

For demonstration we'll load the `mammal_sleep_tbl` data from the [mgrtibbles package](/datasets/mgrtibbles.qmd) (hyperlink includes install instructions).

```{r}
#Load package
library("mgrtibbles")
#mammal_sleep_tbl tibble for demonstration
mgrtibbles::mammal_sleep_tbl
```

## Replace with a value
```{r}
mammal_sleep_tbl |>
    tidyr::replace_na(list(dreaming=0))
```

## Replace with other column
```{r}
mammal_sleep_tbl |>
    dplyr::mutate(dreaming = dplyr::coalesce(dreaming, total_sleep))
```

## Replace all NAs

```{r}
mammal_sleep_tbl[is.na(mammal_sleep_tbl)] <- 0
mammal_sleep_tbl
```
